statements: SELECT * FROM video_playback_data WHERE viewer_id = 123;
SELECT video_id, MAX(playback_duration) AS max_duration FROM video_playback_data GROUP BY video_id;
SELECT viewer_id, playback_timestamp FROM video_playback_data WHERE playback_duration > 60 ORDER BY playback_timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(playback_duration) AS avg_duration, playback_speed FROM video_playback_data GROUP BY playback_speed HAVING avg_duration > 30;
SELECT DISTINCT viewer_id, playback_speed FROM video_playback_data ORDER BY viewer_id, playback_speed DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, video_id, playback_timestamp, playback_duration FROM video_playback_data ORDER BY playback_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT AVG(playback_duration) AS avg_duration, MAX(playback_speed) AS max_speed FROM video_playback_data GROUP BY video_id
SELECT viewer_id, video_id, playback_timestamp FROM video_playback_data WHERE playback_duration > 300 ORDER BY viewer_id ASC, playback_timestamp DESC
SELECT DISTINCT viewer_id, COUNT(video_id) AS video_count FROM video_playback_data GROUP BY viewer_id HAVING COUNT(video_id) > 3

SELECT viewer_id, video_id, playback_duration, playback_timestamp FROM video_playback_data WHERE playback_duration < 60 AND playback_speed BETWEEN 1.0 AND 2.0 ORDER BY playback_duration ASC, playback_speed DESC
SELECT * FROM playback_data WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, playback_timestamp, playback_duration FROM playback_data WHERE video_id = 456;
SELECT video_title, video_duration FROM video_metadata WHERE video_resolution = '1080p';
SELECT user_id, video_id, playback_timestamp, playback_speed FROM playback_data WHERE playback_duration > '00:10:00';
SELECT video_id, video_title, video_resolution, video_format FROM video_metadata;
SELECT user_id, video_id, playback_timestamp, playback_duration, playback_speed FROM playback_data WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY playback_timestamp DESC;
SELECT video_title, video_duration, video_resolution FROM video_metadata WHERE video_resolution = '1080p' AND video_format = 'mp4';
SELECT user_id, video_id, playback_duration FROM playback_data WHERE video_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND user_id = 2 ORDER BY playback_duration ASC, playback_timestamp DESC;
SELECT video_id, video_title FROM video_metadata WHERE video_duration > INTERVAL '1 hour' AND video_format = 'avi' ORDER BY video_duration DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(playback_speed) AS speed_count FROM playback_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(playback_speed) > 5 ORDER BY speed_count DESC;
SELECT video_id, video_title, video_duration, upload_date FROM video_metadata;
SELECT * FROM playback_data WHERE playback_duration > 600;
SELECT video_title, playback_start, playback_end FROM video_metadata JOIN playback_data ON video_metadata.video_id = playback_data.video_id;
SELECT user_id, total_playbacks FROM user_engagement WHERE total_playbacks > 10;
SELECT video_title, upload_date FROM video_metadata WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT video_title, video_duration, upload_date FROM video_metadata WHERE video_id = 'e3c67c87-ff32-4488-8221-2493c75f5d3f';
SELECT playback_id, playback_start, playback_end, playback_duration FROM playback_data WHERE video_id = 'e3c67c87-ff32-4488-8221-2493c75f5d3f' ORDER BY playback_start DESC;
SELECT user_id, total_playbacks, total_duration_watched FROM user_engagement WHERE total_playbacks > 5 ORDER BY total_duration_watched DESC;
SELECT video_title, video_duration, upload_date FROM video_metadata WHERE upload_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY upload_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, total_playbacks, total_duration_watched FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id = 'b12d66f9-9667-480d-beb6-900838425d7f';
SELECT * FROM playback_data;
SELECT video_id, playback_start_time, playback_end_time FROM playback_data WHERE playback_quality = 'HD';
SELECT user_name, country_code FROM user_profile WHERE account_created_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT video_title, upload_time FROM video_metadata ORDER BY upload_time DESC;
SELECT error_id, error_description FROM playback_errors WHERE error_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY error_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM playback_data ORDER BY playback_start_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT video_id, playback_quality FROM playback_data WHERE playback_duration > '00:10:00' AND playback_quality = 'HD';
SELECT user_name, country_code FROM user_profile WHERE country_code IN ('US', 'CA', 'UK') ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT video_title, upload_time FROM video_metadata WHERE upload_time >= '2022-01-01' AND upload_time <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT error_description, error_time FROM playback_errors WHERE error_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY error_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM VideoCatalog WHERE category = 'Comedy';
SELECT video_title, duration_minutes FROM VideoCatalog WHERE duration_minutes > 60 ORDER BY video_title ASC;
SELECT viewer_id, viewer_name, country FROM ViewerProfile WHERE age < 30 AND country = 'USA';
SELECT video_id, playback_timestamp, resolution_height, resolution_width FROM VideoQuality WHERE resolution_width > 1920;
SELECT log_id, error_type, error_description FROM ErrorLog ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM VideoCatalog ORDER BY video_title DESC, category ASC
SELECT viewer_name, country FROM ViewerProfile WHERE age > 18
SELECT video_title, category, duration_minutes FROM VideoCatalog WHERE duration_minutes > 60 ORDER BY duration_minutes ASC
SELECT viewer_name, country, age FROM ViewerProfile WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT * FROM PlaybackLog JOIN VideoCatalog ON PlaybackLog.video_id = VideoCatalog.video_id
